initial.text: Hey there, how's it going in the house?

options.text: Pretty good, just trying to figure out the game.
I'm worried about nominations. Any advice?
Want to form an alliance?
Just checking in. See you around!

game_advice.text: This game is all about social strategy. Build relationships, but don't make yourself too much of a threat. Stay under the radar early, then make your big moves when the numbers thin out.

options.text: That makes sense. Any specific strategies you recommend?
Thanks for the advice. I'll keep that in mind.

specific_strategy.text: I've found that forming small, loyal alliances works better than large ones. Also, winning competitions is important, but sometimes it's better to throw them if winning would put a target on your back.

options.text: Good point. I'll be careful about when to win.

nomination_advice.text: If you're worried about nominations, your best bet is to build a relationship with the HoH. Show them you're valuable to their game, or at least not a threat.

options.text: And if I become HoH, who should I nominate?
Thanks, that helps.

hoh_advice.text: As HoH, you want to nominate people who aren't in your alliance and who won't come after you if they stay. It's a balancing act between making a move and not creating too many enemies.

options.text: I'll remember that when I win HoH.

alliance_proposal.text: An alliance? Hmm, I'm interested. We could work well together. What would you call it?

options.text: The Silent Strategy
Power Players
Actually, let me think about this more first.

alliance_accept_silent.text: The Silent Strategy. I like it. Subtle but effective. Alright, you've got yourself a deal. Let's keep this between us and see how far we can go.

options.text: Great! Let's dominate this game.

alliance_accept_power.text: Power Players. Bold name, might put a target on our backs, but I'm in. Let's show them who's running this house.

options.text: Perfect! We'll control this game.

alliance_decline.text: No rush. It's smart to consider your options carefully in this game. Let me know if you change your mind.

options.text: I will, thanks.

initial.text: Hi there! This house is pretty intense, isn't it?

options.text: Very intense. How are you handling it?
Who do you think is the biggest threat?
Want to work together?
Just saying hi. Talk later!

handling_house.text: I'm trying to stay calm and observe everyone. People reveal a lot when they think no one is watching. I've noticed some interesting dynamics forming already.

options.text: What have you noticed?
That's smart. I should pay more attention.

house_dynamics.text: Well, I've seen a few people having secret conversations in the storage room. And it seems like there's already a divide forming between the competition beasts and the social players.

options.text: Interesting. Let's keep an eye on that.

biggest_threat.text: If I had to guess, I'd say NPC1 is someone to watch out for. They're building relationships with everyone and seem to be playing all sides. Classic under-the-radar strategy.

options.text: Good to know. I'll keep that in mind.
What about you? What's your strategy?

own_strategy.text: Me? I'm focusing on competitions. If I can win power, I control my own fate. But I'm also building selective relationships. It's all about balance in this game.

options.text: Smart approach. Best of luck.

work_together.text: Work together? I'm open to it. What did you have in mind?

options.text: A solid two-person alliance. We watch each other's backs.
Maybe we can form a larger alliance with some others?
Actually, let me think about this more.

two_person_alliance.text: A final two deal? I like it. Simple and clear. Let's do it, but we'll need to be careful. We should still socialize with others so we don't look too obvious.

options.text: Agreed. Our secret stays between us.

larger_alliance.text: Who were you thinking of including? We need to be careful about who we trust.

options.text: Maybe NPC1? They seem strategic.
Let's start with just us and see who else might be trustworthy.

include_npc1.text: NPC1? Hmm, they're playing a good game, but I'm not sure I trust them completely. Still, it could be good to have them with us rather than against us.

options.text: Let's approach them and see.
You're right, maybe we should rethink this.

start_small.text: I like that approach. Let's build a foundation first and then carefully expand if needed. We can call ourselves 'The Foundation'.

options.text: Perfect. To a long and successful alliance.

rethink_alliance.text: No problem. Alliances are serious business in this house. Take your time and think it through. My door is always open.

options.text: Thanks for understanding.
